TextLibrary.Text: I have followed the sword. It has shown me power that I never dreamed could exist.
I have followed the sword. It has shown me power that I never dreamed could exist.
I have followed the sword. It has shown me power that I never dreamed could exist.
I have followed the sword. It has shown me power that I never dreamed could exist.
Then join with me. Together we will rule these lands. Nobody will dare challenge us.
Then join with me. Together we will rule these lands. Nobody will dare challenge us.
Then join with me. Together we will rule these lands. Nobody will dare challenge us.
Then join with me. Together we will rule these lands. Nobody will dare challenge us.
Join you? Hah! You are a fool, Bane. Why should I join you... when I can REPLACE you!
